- This model name is compatible with Google''s v1beta API

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add resume selector to popup - replace job count display

- Replaced job count with current resume display
- Added resume switching functionality in popup
- Users can now see which resume is active
- Click "Change" to select different resume
- Auto re-triggers AI analysis when resume is switched
- Shows upload prompt if no resume exists

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Use gemini-pro model for better API compatibility

- Changed from gemini-1.5-pro-latest to gemini-pro
- gemini-pro is the stable model name for v1beta API
- Should resolve 404 model not found errors
